[**ExtraVM**](https://extravm.com) // Promotion: **LET10** - 10% off recurring on VPS. Stacks with billing cycle discounts.  
  
**Features:**  
- Check/change DDoS mitigation status from billing panel  
- Modify network firewall and game firewall from billing panel  
- Set rDNS (v4 and v6) from billing panel  
- Receive e-mail notifications when an attack is detected against an IP (optional, enabled by default)  
- Read more about these features: [_DDoS Protection_](https://extravm.com/billing/index.php/knowledgebase/71/How-Our-DDoS-Protection-Works.html) - [_IP Management_](https://extravm.com/billing/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/80/IP-Management.html)  
- Fast hardware such as E3-1270v6, i7-7700K, NVMe SSDs and Samsung Datacenter SSDs. 
[Read more](https://extravm.com/billing/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/31/What-hardware-do-you-use.html)  
- Updated OS options incl. CentOS 7.5, CentOS 6.10, Ubuntu 18.04 and more or use your own ISO  
  
**KVM Game Plans (Access to game firewall):**  
512MB RAM / 1 Core 4.2GHz / 6GB SSD / 1TB @ 200Mbps - $3/mo => [London, UK & Montreal, CA](https://extravm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=186)  
1GB RAM / 1 Core 4.2GHz / 13GB SSD / 2TB @ 250Mbps - $6/mo => [London, UK & Montreal, CA](https://extravm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=178)  
1GB RAM / 1 Core 4.2GHz / 14GB SSD / 200GB @ 250Mbps - $7/mo => [Singapore](https://extravm.com/billing/cart.php?gid=24)
